text: The 2016 Atlantic Sun Conference men's soccer season was the 39th season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The North Florida Ospreys are both the defending regular season and conference tournament champions. == Changes from 2015 == * The NJIT Highlanders will be joining the conference. == Teams == === Stadia and locations === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
